alert.note: Alert for North Big Horn Basin; Southeast Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 7:20PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...AN AREA OF MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF NORTH BIG HORN BASIN AND SOUTHEAST BIG HORN BASIN COUNTIES... HAZARDS...An area of moderate to heavy snow accompanied by winds of 20 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 719 PM MST, an area of heavy snow was 16 miles northwest of Winchester, or 19 miles west of Worland moving east at 40 MPH. THIS AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Worland around 750 PM MST. Hyattville around 815 PM MST. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this area of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: North Big Horn Basin; Southeast Big Horn Basin
